paper_abstract: In this paper we shall investigate the positive center set of a convex curve and show that has only one point if and only if is a circle; is a segment if and only if is a sausage curve; if is a strictly convex non-circular curve, then is a domain of positive area; and furthermore, if is a constant width curve, then is its inner parallel body K-r1.
paper_title: Positive Center Sets of Convex Curves
